plot: Grandpa tries to help Ben by setting up a training area. He also tries to teach him to think about his selections and his moves. In the mean time, Vilgax sends some bounty hunters after the Omnitrix.

With Ben getting cocky over his alien-enhanced abilities, Gwen expresses an open wish to see him get his butt kicked. That wish is soon granted when Vilgax sends three very capable alien bounty hunters to track Ben down and take his Omnitrix.—statmanjeff
